xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #phenotips on 12 February 2014
xwikidoc.content: <allasm> has quit 10:25 <akats> has joined #phenotips 10:56 <sdumitriu> has quit 11:04 <sdumitriu> has joined #phenotips 11:07 <allasm> has joined #phenotips 11:13 <akats> Sergiu do you have some time today? 11:15 <sdumitriu> akats: A bit, yes 11:22 <akats> I've been stuck on 2 problems: adding an xobject to a document (I know, how simple is that). It successfully adds itself to the document but it then proceeds to remove itself. My guess is that it has to do something with XWikiContext. The second problem is live tables. I tried to figure out how the one in XWiki.XWikiGroupSheet works but was not exactly successful. So I read the documents. But it didn't make the workings of the table in XWikiGroupSheet cleare 11:41 <marta__> has quit 11:46 <sdumitriu> allasm: Pushed, see here 11:46 <sdumitriu> : 11:47 <sdumitriu> https://github.com/phenotips/patient-network/tree/master/communication 11:56 <marta__> has joined #phenotips 13:07 <marta__> has quit 13:58 <sdumitriu> allasm: queryManager.createQuery("from doc.object(PhenoTips.PatientClass) as o where o.guid = :guid", "xwql").bindValue("guid", "6bfebbf8-b692-498b-9457-ebe58f7b18a2").execute() 16:14 <akats> Sdumitriu: The avatars do not need to be clickable, I'm assuming? 16:16 <sdumitriu> Not necessarily 17:56 <akats> Btw did you make an issue for what I'm working on? 17:57 <sdumitriu> Not yet 18:21 <akats> Which method does a for loop call when iterating? [ for(obj : objs)] 19:10 <akats> has quit
